name: Alfonse
description: A prince of Askr who's kind and serious. He's taking part in the spring festival as a member of the Order of Heroes.
insights: Alfonse is the only hero with Giant Spoon+.
Alfonse is the only hero with Giant Spoon.
Alfonse is the only hero with Def Smoke 3.
Alfonse is the only hero with Def Smoke 2.
Alfonse is the only hero with Def Smoke 1.

dialogue.text: I am Alfonse, Prince of Askr. Please... Let's talk about something besides this costume. What do you say?
Sharena's personality suits this sort of getup... My sister has a modern sensibility. But me? Why ME?
Are you aware of a race in the World of Awakening called taguel? They can change to a form similar to a rabbit.
It seems my sister prepared a costume for you as well. She suggested that we might be less embarrassed if you dressed up, too... So where is it?
Do you have a spare moment? I'd like to train if you're up for it. No, we will not be practicing our bunny hops.
My father is stern and very serious... I think seeing me in this getup would probably make him faint.
I bring regards from <Friend Name>. Er... Now, if you'll excuse me...
It truly is the springtime of my youth, wouldn't you say?
Plant the seeds, and springtime will be in full blossom.
There's still a chill in the air...
Thank you. You are as bright as the springtime sun.

So, <Player Name>... I've been studying the spring festival. The symbolism of the celebration is fascinating... Eggs represent life and birth...while rabbits bear a large number of offspring, so— Oh, the costume? I guess I'm stuck with it until Sharena says it's OK to pack it up. It's funny...maybe even scary...how fast you can get used to something. The longer I'm dressed like this, the stranger the idea of taking it off seems! The idea puts me on edge... But I can rest assured you'll stay friends with me no matter how I'm attired, I suppose. No need to worry! Thanks, <Player Name>. It's nice to know I can count on you.
